args.natural_language_statement: Let X be a path connected and locally simply connected topological space, x0 a point of X, and Γ a subgroup of the fundamental group π1(X,x0). Then there exists a connected covering space p : X_Γ → X and a point xΓ ∈ X_Γ such that p_* : π1(X_Γ,xΓ) → π1(X,x0) has image Γ. Moreover, this covering is unique up to unique isomorphism of coverings: if p' : X' → X is another connected covering with image Γ then there is a homeomorphism φ : X_Γ ≃ X' commuting with the projections and unique with that property.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates to express the topological hypotheses without committing to a full development. -/
class PathConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=
()

class LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=
()

class Connected (X : Type _) : Prop :=
()

class IsCovering {X Y : Type _} (p : Y → X) : Prop :=
()

/-- Fundamental group is left abstract as a type parameter in the statement. -/

theorem exists_connected_covering
  {X : Type _} (x0 : X)
  (π1X : Type _) (Γ : Set π1X)
  [PathConnected X] [LocallySimplyConnected X] :
  ∃ (Y : Type _) (p : Y → X) (y0 : Y),
    Connected Y ∧ IsCovering (p) ∧
    ∃ (π1Y : Type _) (p_star : π1Y → π1X),
      Set.image p_star (Set.univ : Set π1Y) = Γ ∧
      (∀ (Z : Type _) (p' : Z → X) (z0 : Z) (π1Z : Type _) (p'_star : π1Z → π1X),
         Connected Z → IsCovering (p') → Set.image p'_star (Set.univ : Set π1Z) = Γ →
         ∃! (φ : Equiv Y Z), (φ.toFun ∘ p = p') ∧ (φ.toFun y0 = z0)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates to express the topological hypotheses without committing to a full development. -/
class PathConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class Connected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class IsCovering {X Y : Type _} (p : Y → X) : Prop :=

/-- Fundamental group is left abstract as a type parameter in the statement. -/

theorem exists_connected_covering
  {X : Type _} (x0 : X)
  (π1X : Type _) (Γ : Set π1X)
  [PathConnected X] [LocallySimplyConnected X] :
  ∃ (Y : Type _) (p : Y → X) (y0 : Y),
    Connected Y ∧ IsCovering (p) ∧
    ∃ (π1Y : Type _) (p_star : π1Y → π1X),
      Set.image p_star (Set.univ : Set π1Y) = Γ ∧
      (∀ (Z : Type _) (p' : Z → X) (z0 : Z) (π1Z : Type _) (p'_star : π1Z → π1X),
         Connected Z → IsCovering (p') → Set.image p'_star (Set.univ : Set π1Z) = Γ →
         ∃! (φ : Equiv Y Z), (φ.toFun ∘ p = p') ∧ (φ.toFun y0 = z0)) := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates to express the topological hypotheses without committing to a full development. -/
class PathConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class Connected (X : Type _) : Prop :=

class IsCovering {X Y : Type _} (p : Y → X) : Prop :=

/-- Fundamental group is left abstract as a type parameter in the statement. -/

theorem exists_connected_covering
  {X : Type _} (x0 : X)
  (π1X : Type _) (Γ : Set π1X)
  [PathConnected X] [LocallySimplyConnected X] :
  ∃ (Y : Type _) (p : Y → X) (y0 : Y),
    Connected Y ∧ IsCovering (p) ∧
    ∃ (π1Y : Type _) (p_star : π1Y → π1X),
      Set.image p_star (Set.univ : Set π1Y) = Γ ∧
      (∀ (Z : Type _) (p' : Z → X) (z0 : Z) (π1Z : Type _) (p'_star : π1Z → π1X),
         Connected Z → IsCovering (p') → Set.image p'_star (Set.univ : Set π1Z) = Γ →
         ∃! (φ : Y ≃ Z), (p' ∘ φ.toFun = p) ∧ (φ.toFun y0 = z0)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates to express the topological hypotheses without committing to a full development. -/
class PathConnected (X : Type _) : Prop where

class LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type _) : Prop where

class Connected (X : Type _) : Prop where

class IsCovering {X Y : Type _} (p : Y → X) : Prop where

/-- Fundamental group is left abstract as a type parameter in the statement. -/

theorem exists_connected_covering
  {X : Type _} (x0 : X)
  (π1X : Type _) (Γ : Set π1X)
  [PathConnected X] [LocallySimplyConnected X] :
  ∃ (Y : Type _) (p : Y → X) (y0 : Y),
    Connected Y ∧ IsCovering (p) ∧
    ∃ (π1Y : Type _) (p_star : π1Y → π1X),
      (p_star '' (Set.univ : Set π1Y)) = Γ ∧
      (∀ (Z : Type _) (p' : Z → X) (z0 : Z) (π1Z : Type _) (p'_star : π1Z → π1X),
         Connected Z → IsCovering (p') → (p'_star '' (Set.univ : Set π1Z)) = Γ →
         ∃! (φ : Y ≃ Z), (p' ∘ φ.toFun = p) ∧ (φ.toFun y0 = z0)) := by
  sorry
